Sentencas: In this study, energy analysis of a trigeneration plant based on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) and organic Rankine cycle (ORC) is conducted.
Titulo: Energy analysis of a trigeneration plant based on solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The physical and thermodynamic elements of the plant include an SOFC, an ORC, a heat exchanger for the heating process and a single-effect absorption chiller for cooling.
Titulo: Energy analysis of a trigeneration plant based on solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The results obtained from this study show that there is at least a 22% gain in efficiency using the trigeneration plant compared with the power cycle (SOFC and ORC).
Titulo: Energy analysis of a trigeneration plant based on solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The study also shows that the maximum efficiency of the trigeneration plant is 74%, heating cogeneration is 71%, cooling cogeneration is 57% and net electricity is 46%.
Titulo: Energy analysis of a trigeneration plant based on solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle

Sentencas: Furthermore, it is found that the highest net power output that can be provided by the trigeneration plant considered in this study is 540 kW and, the highest SOFC-AC power is 520 kW.
Titulo: Energy analysis of a trigeneration plant based on solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The study reveals that the inlet pressure of the turbine has an insignificant effect on the efficiency.
Titulo: Energy analysis of a trigeneration plant based on solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle

Sentencas: The study also examines the effect of both the SOFC current density and the SOFC inlet flow temperature on the cell voltage and voltage loss.
Titulo: Energy analysis of a trigeneration plant based on solid oxide fuel cell and organic Rankine cycle
